channel.title: Run.bat help for client! please help
channel.description:
OK so i got the client and everything but i want to play on the clients run.bat but when i click it appears disappear in a millisecond. Or it says something like system doesn't know java...my java is 16 I'm pretty sure. I don't know if its my comp or the code. (if tried like 100 codes already!!!)By the way i know how to run server just not how to get the client window thing up...
Here pics This is the source/client... [IMG]http://i253.photobucket.com/albums/hh41/lilmojo1/run.jpg[/img]
Heres my code... [IMG]http://i253.photobucket.com/albums/hh41/lilmojo1/lolcat.jpg[/img]
Heres error i get [IMG]http://i253.photobucket.com/albums/hh41/lilmojo1/lolcats.jpg[/img]
